message: Let's get this started. I'm taking the lion's share, but at least you get something.  Consider this a gesture of goodwill.
I'm not going to let you take the lion's share so easily. I'm offering you a fair deal, but you'll still get a decent chunk.
You're being greedy, Bob.  This is a much fairer deal than your last offer.  Think about it.
I'm not going to give in to your demands yet, Alice. I'm willing to compromise, but you're still going to have to meet me halfway.
This is my final offer, Bob.  You're losing more and more with each round.  Let's make a deal before it's too late.
I'm not going to let you take advantage of me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I'm not going to give in completely. This is my best offer, take it or leave it.
